name: View Page Source
description: Get access to the page source with the click of a button
author: Carlos Jeurissen
content_security_policy: default-src 'none'; child-src 'none'; connect-src 'none'; font-src 'none'; frame-src 'none'; img-src 'none'; manifest-src 'none'; media-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; prefetch-src 'none'; worker-src 'none'; script-src 'self' 'sha384-UBdlBt36Fbxyck8iWagNvqCRddg+AmB1PIW8PhuW/lnEULG2ZdzLrMw5HUyEfFwY'; script-src-attr 'none'; script-src-elem 'sha384-UBdlBt36Fbxyck8iWagNvqCRddg+AmB1PIW8PhuW/lnEULG2ZdzLrMw5HUyEfFwY'; style-src 'none'; style-src-attr 'none'; style-src-elem 'none'; base-uri 'none'; form-action 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; block-all-mixed-content; upgrade-insecure-requests; sandbox allow-same-origin allow-scripts; require-sri-for script style
